docs.snippet: The president’s criticism showcased a determination to broaden his indictment of Mr. Trump into an indictment of the Republican Party....

docs.abstract: Pres Barack Obama, speaking at Hillary Clinton rally at Florida Memorial University, denounces Republican Sen Marco Rubio for changing his position and endorsing presidential nominee Donald Trump.

docs.snippet: Couples say they are talking to each other about sexism in new ways and revealing assaults that had been buried for years....
docs.lead_paragraph: Couples say they are talking to each other about sexism in new ways and revealing assaults that had been buried for years.
docs.abstract: Couples across country say recording of Donald Trump using crude language to describe groping women has sparked conversations about sexual harassment and assault, and has led some women to reveal damaging experiences they had buried for years; conversations have brought some couples closer while splintering marriages and relationships for others.

headline.main: She Never Spoke of It to Her Husband. Then She Heard the Trump Tape.

docs.abstract: Private security firm Dell SecureWorks concludes Russian foreign intelligence service GRU was behind hacking of email account of Hillary Clinton’s campaign chairman John D Podesta; reveals methods and links used by hackers.

docs.snippet: The battle to succeed Senator Harry Reid of Nevada, who is retiring, is one of a handful of contests that could determine control of Congress....
docs.lead_paragraph: The battle to succeed Senator Harry Reid of Nevada, who is retiring, is one of a handful of contests that could determine control of Congress.
docs.abstract: Close United States Senate race in Nevada, between Republican Rep Joe Heck and Democrat Catherine Cortez Masto for seat held by retiring Sen Harry Reid, will likely be decided by which side has better ground game; so-called super PACs are particularly important for get-out-the-vote operations, especially on Republican side, as many voters struggle to reconcile their views with those of presidential nominee Donald Trump.

headline.main: A Key Senate Race Shifts to a Ground Game: Knocking on Doors
headline.print_headline: Key Nevada Senate Race Shifts to Ground Game: Knocking on Doors

docs.snippet: Defying his notorious stinginess, Donald Trump more than doubled his campaign spending last month compared to August. He burned through roughly $70 million as his standing in polls and among fellow Republicans dropped....
docs.lead_paragraph: Defying his notorious stinginess, Donald Trump more than doubled his campaign spending last month compared to August. He burned through roughly $70 million as his standing in polls and among fellow Republicans dropped.

headline.main: Trump, Clinton Spending Furiously as Election Day Nears
headline.print_headline: Trump, Clinton Spending Furiously as Election Day Nears

docs.snippet: Donald Trump gained on Hillary Clinton among American voters this week, cutting her lead nearly in half despite a string of women accusing him of unwanted sexual advances and the furor over his disputed claims that the election process is rigged, ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump gained on Hillary Clinton among American voters this week, cutting her lead nearly in half despite a string of women accusing him of unwanted sexual advances and the furor over his disputed claims that the election process is rigged, according to a Reuters/Ipsos poll released on Friday.

headline.main: Trump Gains on Clinton Despite Furor Over Women, Election Comments
headline.print_headline: Trump Gains on Clinton Despite Furor Over Women, Election Comments

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton's campaign is increasingly preparing for the possibility that Donald Trump may never concede the presidential election should she win, a development that could enormously complicate the crucial early weeks of her preparations to ta...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton's campaign is increasingly preparing for the possibility that Donald Trump may never concede the presidential election should she win, a development that could enormously complicate the crucial early weeks of her preparations to take office.

headline.main: Clinton Camp Preparing for Possibility Trump Won't Concede
headline.print_headline: Clinton Camp Preparing for Possibility Trump Won't Concede

docs.snippet: The annual Alfred E. Smith Memorial Foundation Dinner, a white-tie gala in New York that is often the last time the two presidential nominees share a stage before Election Day, is traditionally a time when campaign hostilities are set aside....
